Key Match Events: Tanzim Hasan's unpredictable bowling disrupted India's middle order
Rishabh Pant's explosive innings with five boundaries in eight balls
Hardik Pandya's 50* despite facing only 18 deliveries by the 18th over
Kuldeep Yadav took three wickets and dismissed Bangladesh's key batters
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's partnership has been underwhelming in this tournament
India's middle order is packed with six-hitters due to the absence of Kohli and Rohit
Bangladesh's opening partnership has struggled to score consistently
Post-Match Reflections: India's new identity in this World Cup is finding success with quickfire cameos
Bangladesh's chase was hampered by lack of clarity and panic swings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rishad Hossain secured Bangladesh's best period of play with 2.4 overs of singles and dots
Bangladesh's chase was derailed by Kuldeep Yadav's effective spin bowling
